column4: hi,  this question is probably asked very often here.    I'm running 8.04 now.  I want to reinstall because too much is messed up and I'd like to start fresh.  would installing 8.10 be a good idea if I value stability ?   what about repo size and updated version software ?

Ubuntu 8.04 is supported until April, 2011. Ubuntu 8.10 is supported until April 2010. 8.10 has newer software, and is used by more people. 8.04 has older software, but is theoretically a little more stable.
thanks for the info.   how come 8.04 which is older is supported for more years than 8.10 though ?
8.04 is a Long Term Support release. They're supported for 3 years from release instead of the normal 18 months.
